title: Pixel 2 XL usb C audio not working with the given usb c to 3.5mm adapter
content:
I am using Google Pixel 2 XL and the given box piece accessory usb type c to 3.5mm adaptor is not working with the audio and the device plays through the speakers inspite of adapter is connected.
Its a april 2018 model and purchased on october 2018

kindly please help me out in this
